text:
Here, I will talk about why I chose this path for my studies.
Many times, I have seen that powerful people rules the world and give it a meaning. So I have sought what could give me this strength that other people don't have.
That's how I end up looking for something special that make you say : “WOW”.
I used to play video game during my childhood and looking for games or app online.
I preferred to be on my computer instead of hanging out with friends. Because here I felt I could do anything.
I could learn amazing stories, new languages and even have more impact here than outside in front of my house, even with a strong weapon.
Today, that's what I still believe in. That behind a computer with the right knowledge I can do everything.
This believing is linked with how I have seen the other use technology. It's always like they struggle with it, they always say : “I wish I were better with it”, “Why can't I do it?”
I was young, and I searched ways to prove my value. So learning how the computer work, what's behind, why people built it that way was a good manner to impress.
Still today, when I say I am in studies of computer science, I see stars in the eyes of people. It feels like I am a wizard with superpowers.
It's like everybody have this little problem they don't know how to solve, and I can help them with that.
Even the wages for an IT engineer feels wrong, they are too high for what I seam doing.
Have extra time and money compare to a classic job is amazing, knowing that I really like programming and my job is useful.
That's why I can't imagine doing any other things in my life, I don't regret my choice, and I feel glad to have the luck to live this path of life.
